sname

slabel

sdescriptors

sinitialization
false
smodifier
public
sinheritDescription
false
sicon
icons/javax/swing/JMenu.gif
sdescription
<p>A menu object. This is the container to which you may add menu items. Menu can also serve as a base class when you want a specialized menu based off of another component (like Ext.menu.DateMenu for example).</p>
snotXmlAttribute
false

or general <a href="output/Ext.Component.html" ext:cls="Ext.Component">Component</a>s.
